en.today: The moon enters Sagittarius and connects with dreamy Neptune this morning, dear Aries, putting you in a vibrant and optimistic mood. Allow your mystical side to take the lead, trusting that you and the universe are aligned. Meanwhile, Pluto activates in your solar eleventh house, helping you deepen new relationships. Focus on cultivating mutually beneficial connections, leaning into the power of community. People will be drawn to your magnetic aura when Venus activates in your sign later this evening. Make the most of these vibes by focusing on romance, personal goals, and making strong first impressions.

en.today: Highly mystical vibes surround you this morning, warm lion, as the Sagittarius moon and Neptune align. Start your day right by connecting with an intention and asking the stars for support while setting yourself up for success. Your playful side shines through while Pluto activates, giving others plenty of reasons to adore you. If you've been working on building up a romantic connection, now is a good time to let passion guide the way. Open your heart and invite in divine support when Luna and Venus align later tonight, heightening your intuition and ability to connect with the universe in harmonious ways.

en.today: A gentle yet profound release finds you early this morning, sweet bull, as the Sagittarius moon and Neptune align. Let emotions flow through you, doing what you can to call in the light and manifest positive changes. Bring some intensity to your professional aspirations while Luna and Pluto connect. Don't be afraid to pull power moves, strike deals, and fiercely advocate for what you deserve. This energy also supports romantic partnerships when long-term goals are shared. Take some time to yourself when Venus stirs this evening, hiding away from the outside world to go deep with your self-care routines.

en.today: The moon drifts into Sagittarius and aspects Neptune this morning, dear Gemini, emphasizing your gift for making connections. Harness these vibes by investing in dynamics, both old and new, revitalizing your sense of community. A spiritual element comes into play while Pluto activates, and you'll have opportunities to bring new meaning to your relationships. Increased chemistry and shared beliefs go hand in hand but leave plenty of room for free thinking and individualism. Consider scheduling a romantic night on the town as evening sets in and Venus activates, supporting your local economy by showing up to help small businesses.
